question: Failure of the intestinal loops to return to the abdominal cavity by week 11 after physiological hernia at 6th week results in the formation of:
True about the given diagram:
exp: Given image - Meckel's diveiculum CHOICE EXPLANATION & ELIMINATION REASON 1 Situated 2 feet proximal 2 Located on anti-messenteric border 3 In 2% of population 4 True statement
opa: It is found 2 feet distal to the ileocecal juntion
opb: It is located on the mesenteric side of the ileum
opc: It occurs in approximately 20% of the population
opd: It is a persistent remnant of the embryonic yolk stalk.
